item.title: Millions without power in Spain, Portugal and parts of France, Spanish officials say
item.description: Millions of people in Spain, Portugal and parts of France lost power on Monday due to an unknown grid issue, the Spanish government confirmed to ABC N...

item.title: Democrats press WH over potential 'insider trading' before Trump tariff pause
item.description: The Democrats “urgently” called for the White House to issue the full disclosure of financial transactions of senior officials amid Trump's tariff rol...

item.title: Trump giving ABC News 1st broadcast interview at 100 days mark
item.description: President Trump is giving the first broadcast interview at the 100 days mark to ABC News.

item.title: Trump has lowest 100-day approval rating in 80 years: POLL
item.description: Donald Trump has the lowest 100-day job approval rating of any president in the past 80 years, according to an ABC News/Washington Post/Ipsos poll.

item.title: Nearly two-thirds of Americans disapprove of Trump tariffs: POLL
item.description: Seven in 10 Americans think Donald Trump’s tariffs on international trade will drive up U.S. inflation, according to an ABC News/Washington Post/Ipsos...
